newsitem.title: UK: LPC-Granada has 300 mln stg loan for Yorkshire buy.
newsitem.headline: LPC-Granada has 300 mln stg loan for Yorkshire buy.

text.p: LONDON, June 25 (LPC) - Granada Group Plc has received a 300 million stg loan to back its agreed bid to buy the 73 percent stake in Yorkshire-Tyne Tees Television that it does not already own, according to Henry Staunton, finance director of Granada Group.
ABN AMRO, Barclays Bank, Chase Investment Bank and NatWest Markets are arranging the credit which is expected to be syndicated to other banks shortly.
Under the recommended offer which values Yorkshire's entire share capital at 711 million stg, media and leisure group Granada will pay 536 million stg to complete its ownership of Yorkshire shares.

The 364-day credit is priced competitively and carries a margin of below 15 bps over LIBOR, a price that Granada is paying on a 225 million stg credit that it signed earlier this month, Staunton said.
Granada is expected to repay the bridging finance via its disposal programme.
